name: EF EVE™ - volumetric video platform
detailed_description:
EF EVE™ – first consumer friendly volumetric video platform.




Meet real people in virtual reality via EF EVE™.
Use our Camera app and 2 x Kinect version 2 to capture or stream your own live volumetric events.



EF EVE ™ is a platform where everyone can watch, record or live stream real people into virtual and augmented realities. Choose what you would like to see today - a performance, a story, a lesson or have a live volumetric video experience - and enjoy it in VR or Desktop mode.

With EF EVE ™ create your own experience with every event: share a room with real people, change the environments, walk around and interact with the artist.

Interested in starting your own volumetric video channel? Record the World around you the way it is - in 3D volume - all you need is our Camera app and 2 Kinects.

short_description:
EF EVE™ – volumetric video platform.

2 x Kinect version 2 and you are able to capture and live stream yourself into virtual reality. No worries if you do not have them. You can attend others' volumetric events via HTC Vive, Oculus or in Windows 10 Desktop mode.

Share a room with a teacher, performer or artist, live stream or record your own volumetric videos and show it to people around the World.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K @ 4.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
